title: Review Security Camera Footage
description: Campus safety needs to review security camera footage following a report of a bicycle theft.

tasks.description: Identify the location and time frame of the reported theft.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the incident occurred near the library between 2 PM and 4 PM.

tasks.description: Access the video management system and retrieve footage from the relevant cameras and time frame.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls the requested video clips.

tasks.description: Securely save the relevant footage as evidence and attach it to the incident report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent archives the video evidence in accordance with policy.
